overview:
Joro Yordanov is the creative director at Witnez.com

Joro Yordanov is twenty years old designer and developer who started designing at age of 13. He has been Senior Designer in a team, developing premium WordPress themes, which generated thousands of sales in Theme Forest marketplace. Graduated from school as a System programmer, Joro has an idea not only what good design and best CSS practices mean, but also what is OOP and how to say “Hello World!” in C++, Java and PHP.

Currently Joro is studying Computer Graphics, while teaching in Web Design Basics course at Technical School Electronic Systems, Sofia. As a passionate WordPress developer, he works with onTheGoSystems on their popular WPML, Types and Views WordPress plugins.

degrees.subject: System programming
degrees.institution: Technical school of Electronic Systems a part of Technical University
